bindthroughfw.help: Enable/disable use of IP/MAC binding to filter packets that would normally go through the firewall.
bindthroughfw.name: bindthroughfw

options.help: Enable IP/MAC binding for packets that would normally go through the firewall.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable IP/MAC binding for packets that would normally go through the firewall.
options.name: disable

bindtofw.help: Enable/disable use of IP/MAC binding to filter packets that would normally go to the firewall.
bindtofw.name: bindtofw

options.help: Enable IP/MAC binding for packets that would normally go to the firewall.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable IP/MAC binding for packets that would normally go to the firewall.
options.name: disable

undefinedhost.help: Select action to take on packets with IP/MAC addresses not in the binding list (default = block).
undefinedhost.name: undefinedhost

options.help: Allow packets from MAC addresses not in the IP/MAC list.
options.name: allow

options.help: Block packets from MAC addresses not in the IP/MAC list.
options.name: block

results.help: Configure IP to MAC binding settings.
results.name: setting
